name: Slime Go Home
description:
This is a game we created for Global Game Jam in 2019. The theme was "What Home Means to You", and we think that home means that no matter what adventure you are having, in this case you are a slime, that home will always open to you and your parents will always love you.

Credits:

  - Programming, Designing, Level Designing: Darius

  - Music, Level Designing: Skylar
